text: Rachel Carson is a 2017 American documentary film directed by Michelle Ferrari. It is based on the life and work of Rachel Carson, a marine biologist and conservationist. Her 1962 book Silent Spring would serve to advance the environmental movement. The film aired on the PBS network series American Experience on January 24, 2017. ==References== Category:2017 American television episodes Category:2017 television films Category:2017 documentary films Category:American Experience Category:American documentary television films Film
